issue: pytest-asyncio fixture scope conflicts causing event_loop fixture not found errors

test_db_manager fixture expects 'tests/unit/test_config.py::<event_loop>' but not available
Custom event_loop fixture in conftest.py conflicts with pytest-asyncio defaults
pytest-asyncio plugin warning about deprecated event_loop fixture redefinition

solution: Remove custom event_loop fixture from tests/conftest.py
Use pytest-asyncio's built-in event loop management
Change module-scoped async fixtures to function-scoped for compatibility
Update pytest.ini to use event_loop_policy instead of custom event_loop

Fix: Replace custom event loop with pytest-asyncio standard patterns
